name: J Connect
description:
J Connect is an indie game with a lot of levels to play and you'll have to pass.
The game is divided into several squares, and in some of those squares there are colors (2 squares per color). Simply you will have to join the squares of matching colors with each other, occupying all the squares of the board, in such a way that there is no free space.

It seems an easy game, but it is not, since the difficulty lies in the fact that many times the colors are apparently crossed, and you must ingeniartelas to surround some boxes or what you consider to complete the level.

Some feature:

-200 different levels.

-Retro style and graphics

-Easy to understand gameplay.
